content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in salerno in 2009 the case involved two individuals ta and lv who were ordered to pay a total of €3000 and €2000 respectively the compensation amount in the case was €5000 the court ruling was part of a sixyearlong case from 2003 to 2009 but the parties involved are not mentioned the court declared the legitimate succession of a minor named lgl and dissolved the community property between lv and lgl the court approved a division of assets with lv and lgl each receiving a portion lv was ordered to pay a settlement amount to ta and lgl the court also ordered the payment of costs for an experts report and the division proceedings with each party responsible for their respective shares the court declared the judgment as an appropriate title for transcription in the registrars office the case involved the division of an estate with ta representing a minor son named lgl the estate belonged to lg who passed away in 1992 and was divided equally between lv and lc lcs share of the inheritance was inherited by her spouse and son the estate consisted of various properties including flats a small house and agricultural land the courtappointed expert prepared two reports estimating the value of the estate the court decided to divide the estate into two equal portions with each portion containing different properties one party was ordered to pay the other a balance amount and the court costs were to be borne by the estate the court of salerno made a final ruling on the claim brought by the legal representative of lgl declaring the legitimate succession of lg and ordering the payment of costs and fees
